analysis.description:
Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- benefeciar.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol)

BigToken.getBalanceToMint (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#278-301) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastMint[_address] == 0
	- block.number == transactions[i].blockNumber

BigToken.getBalanceToMint (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#278-301) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastMint[_address] == 0
	- block.number == transactions[i].blockNumber
BigToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#129-159) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == transactions[totalTransactions - 1].blockNumber

BigToken.getBalanceToMint (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#278-301) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastMint[_address] == 0
	- block.number == transactions[i].blockNumber
BigToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#129-159) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == transactions[totalTransactions - 1].blockNumber
BigToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#164-197) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == transactions[totalTransactions - 1].blockNumber

Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#364-388) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#384-387)

BigToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#100-101)
BigToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x748f9a0ac36b123c7e4f687f7737f759628c4392.sol#97-98)
